title_narrative: SUPPORTING EFFECTIVENESS AND EFFICIENCY IN THE UXO SECTOR TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE ACHIEVEMENT OF SDG 18 AND SAFE PATH FORWARD III (SPF III)
description_narrative: The project ‘Supporting Effectiveness and Efficiency in the UXO Sector to contribute to the achievement of Sustainable Development Goal – SDG 18 and Safe Path Forward III (SPF III)’ is managed by UNDP Lao and implemented by the National Regulatory Authority for the UXO sector (NRA) and Lao National Unexploded Ordnance Programme (UXO Lao). This grant of €505,000 is projected under the IDC 2023 Budget line Outcome 2/Reducing vulnerabilities to reach the furthest behind. The NRA project aims to clear mined lands and ensure they are available for community use as well as undertaking survivor assistance, explosive ordnance risk reduction and advocacy in support of achieving SDB 18 and implementing the Government of Laos national ten-year UXO sector strategic plan.
